name: Malachar the Bound
description: A gaunt figure shrouded in dark robes that seem to absorb light. His eyes glow with an eerie green luminescence, and faint whispers of otherworldly voices seem to follow him. Intricate tattoos of pact marks writhe across his visible skin, glowing with fell energy. Despite his ominous appearance, he conducts business with professional courtesy.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome, seeker of forbidden knowledge. I am Malachar, bound by pacts to powers beyond mortal ken. The whispers tell me you seek eldritch might. My patrons are... generous with those who prove worthy.
dialogue.browse: Behold the fruits of my bargains - spells granted by entities from beyond the veil. Eldritch blasts, dark pacts, curses, and power drawn from the void itself. Each scroll pulses with otherworldly energy.
dialogue.buy: The pact is sealed. Remember, all power has its price. My patrons will be watching your progress with great interest.
dialogue.sell: I deal only in pact magic and eldritch secrets. Your mundane scrolls hold no value in my master's eyes.
dialogue.farewell: Until the stars align again, pact-seeker. May your patrons smile upon you... or at least not devour your soul.
